title: Android app crashes if send ether [feature/upgrade-status-go-geth17]

milestone.description: Finalize Wallet, introduce updated Discover, Network Switching, and MVP of Push Notifications

body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: App crashes if send ether in 1-1 chat. After sign Transaction app goes on background and upon switching to it user sees Sign in to Status Screen.

It happens only with Android app. For iOS send transaction message is shown in 1-1 chat

#### Expected behavior
ether is sent
#### Actual behavior
app crashes

### Reproduction
. TF session: https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803622-status/builds/6796755/sessions/6/?accessToken=3INV/hhJsn9AGIANtiyzMJYJAj4
- Open Status
- Open 1-1 chat with Jarrad
- Send 0.04 ether

### Additional Information
* Status version: feature/upgrade-status-go-geth17  0.9.10-186-g806c75c2
* Operating System: 
Real device Samsung Galaxy S6, Android 6.0.1

End of the log:
